director.name: 尼古拉·默尔吉内亚努 Nicolae Mărgineanu

this_title: Fals tratat de mântuire a sufletului
introduction: Tom is an inspector at CNSAS. Almost all the teachings he teaches to his youngest "apprentice" is one of revenge and threats, hoping to make this young man a "security hunter". But Radu, who did not live in communism, casts doubt on him whenever he has the opportunity. It is time for the Radu-Toma team to get in touch with a file that seems to bring not only the collaboration w...
